name: Garügol: Lord of Shadows, executively appointed Arch Duke of the pyramid realm

description:
by James Earl Cox III & Joe Cox. Garugol (Lord of Shadows) got the big promotion and is now the new executively appointed Arch Duke of the pyramid realm.
